11.content:
Mr. Krabs went up to SpongeBob.

Mr. Krabs: You're fired.

SpongeBob: Thank you, Mr. Kra- WHAT?

Mr. Krabs: I can save 5¢ if I cut your salary... completely.

SpongeBob: How about I work for free?

Mr. Krabs: No, because (mocking) it's illegal, and I'll lose my vendor's license. (normal) Here's your can. Pink slip. I'm giving you the axe.

(RIP!)

Mr. Krabs: You're Fired! Spatula and hat, please. Oh, allow me.

(RIP!)

Mr. Krabs: Here's your arm back.

Squidward: Please come again... as a customer!

At the pineapple...

SpongeBob: Hey Gary. I'm home... forever. I used to feed Bikini Bottom. Now, I only feed you.

Mr. Krabs, back at the Krusty Krab, put toxic waste in the patties, having a side-effect. SpongeBob, however, was unemployed. Patrick showed up, and thought SpongeBob's Unemployment was Funemployment.

Back at the Krusty Krab, patrons...
11.title: Spongebob Squarepants

112.content:
Patrons shrunk to 2''. Mr. Krabs suddenly knew everything was better with SpongeBob. Spongebob, back at home, was depressed.

(Knock knock knock)

Spongebob: Yes?

Killer Patty showed up. He was Squidward in disguise.

Squidward: Here we go.

Spongebob: Okay.

Squidward: I brought back Spongebob.

Mr. Krabs: Okay, Squidward. Spongebob, you're re-hired.

Spongebob: Now, to make sure the customers are back to normal.

Mr. Krabs: He's good.

24 hours later...

Spongebob: Done!

Mr. Krabs: Oh, to make up for that nickel, I installed a pay toilet in here!

Spongebob: What will he think of next?
112.title: Shrank.

1121.content:
You completed the storyline for Spongebob Squarepants! To find out about Spongebob, go to Wikipedia or Spongebob.com.

This storyline was based on a Spongebob special, Spongebob You're Fired on Nickelodeon.

Watch Spongebob on Nickelodeon.
1121.title: CN XD's ending

12.content:
WARNING!

It is better suited to be at least 12 years of age to view this content, and at most 48 years of age. Due to references to a certain episode, we ask that anyone under 12 and/or afraid of what might happen next to go back to the previous chapter.

The creator of the Cartoon Network XD Interactive will not be responsible by any means if you choose to follow this storyline. All storylines of this interactive & previous interactives are entirely fictional. All U.S. residents under the age of 12 is still allowed to view this, although the creator of the story doesn't recommend it. Please go back if you are under the age of 12.

13.content:
The Bravest Warriors have been cursed to have whatever they sing real.

Our Whole Universe
Was In A Hot Dense State
Then Nearly 14 Billion Years Ago
Expansion Started, Wait! The Earth
Began To Cool
Arthropods Began To Drool
Neanderthals Developed Tools
We Built A Wall
We Built The Pyramids
Math, Science, History,
Unraveling The Mystery
That All Started With A Big Bang
BANG!

With that, the song ended.
13.title: Bravest Warriors

132.content:
Adventure Time,
Come on, grab your friends,
We're going to very distant lands,
With Jake the dog and Finn the human,
The fun that will never end,
It's Adventure
Adventure Time, don't lie around,
The Ice King wants to be pounded down,
So, come on friends, come everyone,
The fun that will never end,
It's Adventure Time!
Hey Ice King! Ready for a beat-up?
Because it's what you're going to get,
If you don't leave now,
On and on again
On and on,
On and on,
ADVENTURE TIME!
MANY ADVENTURES,
TONS AND TONS AND tons and tons,
FROM VIDEOTAPES TO MARCELINE,
THE FUN THAT WILL NEVER END,
The fun that will never end,
IT'S ADVENTURE TIME!

Man: Throw The Cheese!

153.content:
Uncle Grandpa: Good Morning!

Dennis: Hi.

Uncle Grandpa: (CHOMP)

Dennis: Uncle Grandpa, you ate my homework!

153.title: Uncle Grandpa

choices: Dennis: (angry) Egypt! We're going to Egypt!
1531.content:
Dennis: You put me in danger of going to summer school! I hate summer school!

Uncle Grandpa: I'll get you an A++++++-+!

Dennis: Alright!

UG: Expansion land or Egypt? Expansion land or Egypt? Expansion land? Egypt? Expansion land? Egypt?
1531.title: It's awful!

1551.content:
Phineas: The recipe is...

1/2 cup sugar

1 cup flour

2 blocks cream cheese

The right end of a telescope (for baking the cookies)

26 minutes of baking

26 minutes later...

Phineas: Our test batch is done! Who wants to go first?

Isabella: Me!

Phineas: Sure, Isabella.

Isabella: Hey, Phineas.

Phineas: Try one.

Isabella: Okay. (chew, chew, gulp) Ohh, I feel funny.

Phineas: What?

Isabella: Ooh... (swell, swell, swell, swell, swell, swell, swell, swell, swell)

Phineas: Whoa! How'd...

Isabella has become a large girl.
1551.title: Phineas and Ferb

15511.content:
Isabella: (SHRRRIIIINNNNKKK!)

Phineas: We need to test this again.

13 minutes later...

Phineas: Our second batch is done! Isabella?

Isabella: Fine. (gulp) I feel funny.

Phineas: Wait a minute.

Isabella: (SWWWWWEEEEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLLLLLL)

Isabella has become an even larger girl.
15511.title: The effect wears off.

1552.content:
WARNING!

To continue this story, you should be at least 12 years of age.

The creator of the interactive is not responible.
1552.title: Gravity Falls

15521.content:
Dipper: Hey, Mabel.

Mabel: Wanna Brush Our Teeth?

Dipper: Sure.
15521.title: The heck with it!

15532.content:
Mordecai: Extreme Carting?

Rigby: Extreme Carting!

Both: OOOOOOOO!

(cart crashes)

Benson: (angry) What happened to the cart?

Mr. Maellerd: Benson, in my office. NOW!
15532.title: Regular Show

155321.content:
Benson: The warranty will take care of everything.

Mr. Maellerd: This expires tomorrow afternoon!!!

Benson: But the cart dealership's too far away! I have to drive all day and night.

Mr. Maellerd: Sounds like a personal problem. Get it fixed or you're fired!

Mordecai: Benson! We're sorry! We'll make it up to you!

Rigby: Yeah, we'll take it to the dealership ourselves!

Benson: No! We're going to the cart dealership, you two and me, but if you mess this up, I'll fire YOU if Mr. Maellerd doesn't fire ME first!
155321.title: At Mr. Maellerd's office

1553211.content:
Benson drove for 7 hours until he stopped at an arcade.

Benson: Wake me up in 3 hours. Do it or you're fired. Oh, and don't wake me up before then, either.

Mordecai: Video Games?

Rigby: Let's play 24/7!

Mordecai: No, dude. 30 minutes.

But they played for 3 hours before leaving. However, Benson overslept by 3 hours.

Mordecai: (wakes up Benson)

Benson: (angry) Why would you wake me up 3 hours late? Don't you know that your actions have consequences? Consequences that affect other people! (sad) Like me. Don't you get it? I'm about to lose my job. Without it, I have nothing. You hear me? I have nothing! (cries) Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to take my last bathroom break as an employed man.

(later)

Benson: Where were they?

Motorcyclist: They're headed to the cart dealership! Most dangerous highway in the country!

Benson: How much do you want for that bike?

(later)

Benson: You idiots! This is the most dangerous highway in the country!

Mordecai: But this is the only way to get to the dealership on time!

Rigby: Extreme Carting?

Mordecai: Extreme Carting!

So the duo and Benson made it to the dealership by extreme carting.

Rigby: Are you still open?

Dealer: Let me guess... Last day on the warranty?

Rigby: Yeah.
1553211.title: Road Trip

15532111.content:
Rigby: We got the cart to the dealership.

Benson: Yeah, but the truck is totaled.
15532111.title: At the hospital...

155321111.content:
You reached the end of the Regular Show storyline.

This storyline is based on the episode, "Busted Cart".

Watch Regular Show on Cartoon Network.
155321111.title: CN XD's ending

1553321.content:
Finn: Who are you?

Fionna: Fionna the human from the land of Aaa.

Finn: But if you're from Aaa and I'm from Ooo...

Jake: That must mean the dimension thing has been thrown outta whack!

Finn: Oh.

Jake: Yeah...

Finn: Let's freeze ourselves for 1,000 years.

Jake: Is Marceline gonna be around in 1,000 years?

Finn: Heck, yeah! Vampires live forever!

Finn: Come on, Fionna and Cake!

Ice King: Did somebody say Fionna and Cake?

Finn: Yeah. That would be me.

Ice King: 1. Dimensions flip-flopped. 2. I finally met Fionna and Cake!

Finn: We're gonna freeze ourselves for 1,000 years!

Ice King: Can I come?

Finn: Just stay away from Bubblegum.

LSP: Did you say 1,000 years?

Finn: Sure. It's already 1999 in Ooo.

Jake: Dude, you're 14!

Finn: Let's do this!

So they offered all of Ooo to come. On New Year's Eve 1999...

Finn: Ooo will not forget this!

So they froze for 1,000 years.

1,000 years later...

Muffled Voice: Hey! Wait!

SMASH!

Prof. Future: Welcome to New Ooo, Earth!

Finn: NEW Ooo? It's just Ooo.

Prof. Future: Not for long. 400 years after you froze, the monarchy of Ooo was overthrown and a dictatorship was put in it's place until the President of Earth overthrown it as well.

Finn: You mean...

Prof: Welcome, Finn the human, to the Planet Express.
1553321.title: Adventure Time

choices: Finn: I need to go back.
15533212.content:
Finn: How'd you know my name?

Prof. Future removed her mask. It was Marceline!

Marceline: Vampires live forever. I found employment here!

Finn: Wait. Are these the list of jobs?

Marceline: Yeah.

Finn: Are you the captain of this ship? A female is usually-

Marceline: Nope. She is.

Finn: Wait. What?

Finn: The sunlight. Watch out!

Marceline: Oh, I glitter in the sunlight now.

Finn: That's unusual.

So Finn found this out the hard way.
15533212.title: Finn: WHAT?

155332121.content:
Finn: What's the pilot's name?

Marceline: You make a mistake when you ask for HER name. Her name is only known by her family.

Finn: Drat!

Marceline: However, I know who she is.

Finn: Who?

Marceline: (whispers)

Finn: Nice name.

Unknown person: Please report to the Time Generator immediately!

Danny: Let's Go!

Finn: Hey! You're going where?

Danny: L****'s calling for us.

Finn: I couldn't understand you.

Danny: L****.

Finn: Couldn't make the entire name out.

Danny: L****.

Finn: Hey! I don't see what letters you use in the entire word!

Danny: Yeah... Nice costume. Brings the hero out!

Finn: I'm 14.

Chris: Hey Danny! What to do?

Finn: I'm pretty sure this is spinning outta hand!

Danny: Yeah...

Finn: I'm reporting you to Penalton Ward!
155332121.title: Finn: What's the pilot's name?

1553321211.content:
Chris: Hey! This kid sold us out!

Finn: Yeah, and now he's gonna get you for it! (snap!)

(Poof!)

Finn: What is this?

Ward: It's the...

Finn: Yeah, yeah...

Ward: Ridiculous monsters I've never seen before! And what happened, Pen?

Finn: It's Finn.

Jake: You might have went back to 2008.

Finn: Got it! (bite!)

(poof!)

Finn: 2013! (snap!)

(poof!)

Ward: Well, well, well. If it isn't Finn the human. You still with Flame Princess?

Finn: We broke up!

Chris: This kid sold us!

Ward: No, you sold yourselves!

Finn: Yeah...

Ward: Go back from which you came! (pulls out wand)

Ward: (chants)

Bravest Warriors, Blegh Blegh Blegh,

Bravest Warriors, Blah Blah Blah,

Bravest Warriors, go back, go back

Bravest Warriors, go back, go back

To a piece of paper, go back, go back

To a piece of paper

Finn and Ward: So mote it be!

Finn: I didn't know you knew witchcraft!

Ward: Watch this! (chants)

Giant Waistline, grow grow grow

Giant Waistline, grow grow grow

I grow the waistline of Fionna the human

Giant Waistline, so mote it be!

Ward: And... (chants)

Make Fionna grow,

Past 6ft, past 7ft

Make Fionna grow

And control her size, so mote it be!

Finn: Well?
1553321211.title: Penalton Ward appears.

15533212111.content:
Any spell caster should be aware before we continue this story. All and any spells seen in this storyline are completely fake and should not be casted. Please don't try these spells at home. Thank you very much. Want real spells? Go to spellsofmagic.com.

And now back to this previously pre-empted storyline.

Paper: (Chomp)

Fionna: (swell, stretch)

Finn: Heh, heh.

THE END
15533212111.title: They worked!

155332121111.content:
Thank you for completing the Adventure Time storyline.

All Charas created by Pendleton Ward. Penelton Ward created by the maker of the story, and is an alter-ego of Pendleton Ward.

Adventure Time (C) 2014 Cartoon Network.

Bravest Warriors (C) 2013 Cartoon Hangover.
155332121111.title: CN XD's ending

choices: She continues to binge on weight-doubling cookies.
15533221.content:
Dexter: At last! My weight-doubling cookies are complete! Soon, Mandark will be immobile!

Dee Dee: Ooh! What you got there, Dex?

Dexter: Dee Dee! Don't touch those cookies!

Dee Dee: I don't (gulp, GROW) see what (gulp, GROOW) you mean, (gulp, GROOOOOW) Dexter (gulp, GRRRRRRRRROOOOOOOOW)

Dexter: Success! Dee Dee is immobile! That's what she gets for messing in my laboratory.

Dee Dee: Dex- (gulp, GRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOW) -ter?

Dexter: Sisters. They never listen. Up and down and all around. Dee Dee is probably...

Dee Dee: 25374636 pounds!

Dexter: She ate too much cookies! I gotta get back to the lab.

Dee Dee: (gulp, gulp, gulp, gulp, gulp, gulp, gulp, gulp)

Dexter: Dee-

Dee Dee: (SWWWWWWWEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLLLLLLLL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!)

Dexter: My Laboratory! BEHOLD! The weight loss cookie! It burns off all weight you gained via the weight-doubling cookies! Want one!
15533221.title: Dexter's Laboratory

155332211.content:
Dee Dee: Dexter? (gulp)

Dexter: They never listen.

Dee Dee: Oooo, what's this?

Dexter: Noooooooo! That's-

Dee Dee: (gulp)

Dexter: A giantess cookie which gets rid of all excess fat.

Dee Dee: (hiss)

Dexter: Success!

Dee Dee: (STTTRRRRREEEEETTTTTCCCCCHHHHHH!)

Dexter: Hey, sister, watch it! Don't hit the-

Dee Dee: (CRASH)

Dexter: Ceiling. That's it! No more fooling around! I've gotta create an antidote! Robots, build a fence around the city! I've got work to do! Computer, activate the Robo-Dex 2000. I'll suit up. Bakers, begin making that stupid antidote!
155332211.title: She continues to binge on weight-doubling cookies.

1553322111.content:
Dexter: Success!

Dexter: Now, to make a new formula known as Z-20.

2 minutes later...

Dexter: Success!

Dexter: I'll just... Wait, why should I test it on an animal? That would be awkward.

TO BE CONTINUED...
1553322111.title: 20 minutes later...

15533221111.content:
You completed Part 1 of the storyline!

For part 2, see the crossover storyline.
15533221111.title: CN XD's redirection

choices: What the heck, let's do them all!
15533222.content:
Well...

I've never done this before, but to celebrate the completion of the series, I've added a storyline containing crossovers from every single show from the CN XD Interactive series.

Or you could do the Nick Fanon one.
15533222.title: more

155332221.content:
For those who don't know about Nick Fanon, Gorge (the character) is human.

(Chrome is sitting outside.)

Chrome: Yawn! I could sleep on a log!

Bagel: Me too!

Daccino: Come on! Wake up!

Gorge: Not now.

What happens next?
155332221.title: Nickelodeon Fanon

155332222.content:
Dexter: I sure am glad that's over. But now I have no weight-doubling cookies left for Mandark. That stupid, stupid sister of mine has the stupid, stupid stupidity I cannot stand! Stupid Dee Dee and her stupid, stupid ponies... That gives me an idea!

Sora: Aye aye aye! When will Mr. Smarty Pants be here?

Dexter: I PRESENT THE PONY-MAKER! It will make a pony outta my stupid sister!

Finn: Really, Dex?

Dexter: Somnambula, the heck of a pony witch she is! She is so stupid! Stupid, stupid ponies! Too much ponies!

Dee Dee: Dexter! Did you say-

Sora and Finn: Dex-ter! Dex-ter! Dex-ter! Dex-ter! Dex-ter! Dex-ter!

Dexter: And her stupid witchcraft and her stupid spells and her stupid magic and her stupid traps, she is 100% stupid!

Dee Dee: She's

Dexter: Too stupid for words!

Sheldon: I like his way of words.

Dexter: Yeah, Dr. Cooper! Ponies are stupid!

Manic: Sure are!

Dee Dee: Don't underestimate her-

Dexter: Let's get my stupid sister and her stupid talk outta here!

Bee: I like him. Yeah.

Puppycat: (translation) Ponies are stupid.

Dexter: Did that cat-dog just talk?

Bee: (trying to deny it) Uh... no.

Dexter: Stupid ponies. Too much ponies! Stupid, stupid stupidry and stupid, stupid witchcraft and stupid, stupid friendship and stupid, stupid sisters.

Mandark: That's what I also think, Dexter!

Dexter: Mandark?

Mandark: Yeah, Dexter. And I also know this! (makes rude and crude comments about Somnambula)

Dee Dee: Oooo, so that's what it is. You know, she WILL get you.

Dexter: We should stop. As if some stupid pony will get us.

Dee Dee: I see you as... your normal selves!

Dexter: How smart could she be?
155332222.title: What the heck, let's do them all!

choices: Let's Save The Ponies, You Jerk!
1553322221.content:
Next Day...

Dexter: Stupid transitions!

Mandark: Yeah.

Dexter: Hey, Mandark! You are on the wrong line!

Dee Dee: (Chomp!) Yum! Wait... Is this-

Dexter: A 3-day old experiment apple? Please.

Mandark: Ha! (throws apple)

Dexter: Again, wrong side of the line.

Mandark: Dee Dee.

Dexter: Stupid sisters.

Mandark: Hey! You can't talk like that about...

Dexter: Huh?

Dee Dee: (swell)

Dexter: Nice Try, Dee Dee. But those are done for! (swipes bag) Aha! Inflating clothing again, eh?

Dee Dee: What?

Dexter: Stupid sisters.

Dee Dee: Okay!

Mandark: Uh oh.

(Somnambula arrives)

Dexter: (realizing about the trap) No thank you, witch. I don't want to be at the carnival!

Mandark: (also realizing) NO! NEVER AGAIN!

(build build build)

Dexter: The stupid witch.

Mandark: Yeah.

(build build build)

Dexter: Look at that stupid witch! Stupid, stupid witchcraft!

Mandark: Witchcraft should be banned!

Dexter: True.

(build build build)

(Somnambula pulls out Z-20 GTS potion)

(ponies scream in joy)

Dexter: NO! Not Z-20!

(plop!)

Mandark: This is all your fault!

Pinkie: I feel funny...

Dexter: She says she feels funny. Must be the Z-20.

(stretch!)

Dexter: Surprise, surprise. Z-20 works.

Mandark: Well?

Dexter: Fine.
1553322221.title: Way too smart.

choices: Test Z-20 on a female mouse.
Tell Dee Dee how he defeated Somnambula.
15533222211.content:
Mandark & Dexter: SUIT UP!

Dexter: And get in the Robo-Dexo 2000 this time.

(stomp, stomp)

Dexter: There is that stupid formula known as Z-20!

Mandark: Wait. What?

Dexter: Z-20. It's SUPPOSED to make you grow a heavy waist, but I couldn't bear to test it on mice because that would be awkward. I sold the Z-20 to a witch, but I forgot about it's predecessor, Z-19.

Mandark: What does THAT do?

Dexter: Makes you a monster. Only known cure is an Antidote.

Mandark: Any cures for this one?

Dexter: I call it Antidote Z.

Mandark: Okay.

Dexter: Besides, Mandark, I have to deliver it.

Mandark: What does Antidote Z do?

Dexter: It is a panacea to all Z-00 chemicals. A CURE-ALL!

Mandark: Okay.

Dexter: Besides, it isn't fun with a single antidote for each chemical.

(splat)

Dexter: Wait!

(shrink!)

Dexter: Success!

Mandark: They all look like specks.

Dexter: It's this view!

(whirrrr)

Dexter: Thanks. Great miscalculations and circumstance! They've shrunk to about 1 inch! It's supposed to be an antidote! Let me check the label again.

Warning:

Z-21. Shrinks something really small.

Mandark: WHAT?

Dexter: THAT'S IT! ANTIDOTE! Grrrr... (pop!)

(splash)

Dexter: There.

(stretch)

Mandark: So, did we save the world?

Dexter: The answer is yes. Still one more thing to do.
15533222211.title: Let's Save The Ponies, You Jerk!

155332222111.content:
Dexter: I, Dexter, will do what I should've done a long time ago!

Mandark: What?

Dexter: Z-20! It was supposed to grow a giantess-sized waist so the subject would gain 80,000 pounds per drop. It becomes heavier and heavier. I couldn't bear the thought of giantess-sized butts smashing through the lab. I thought the ponies' waists would grow giantess-sized as well. First of all, find a female test subject. I'll be able to listen to animals.

Dexter searched his lab in hopes of finding a female test subject. One looked very feminine.

Dexter: Found one!

I just mix up a drop of Z-20 and a drop of Z-22.

Dexter poured the liquid down the mouse's throat. The mouse's bust expanded, her belly grew, along with hips and butt.

All Dexter said during this was...

Dexter: Sweet Success!
155332222111.title: Test Z-20 on a female mouse.

1553322221111.content:
You completed version 1 of our very final storyline ever.

To read about the events before these, see Dexter's Laboratory.

Z-20, Z-21, and Z-22 are spoofs of Z-19.

Somnambula has been in the original My Little Pony series.

The 3rd chapter's title, "Let's Save The Ponies, You Jerk!" is a parody of "Let's Save The World, You Jerk!"

Watch Dexter's Laboratory on Boomerang from Cartoon Network.
1553322221111.title: CN XD's Ending

info.brief_description: The (hopefully) final installment of the Cartoon Network XD Interactive.
info.description:
CN XD Interactive 3 rules:

Returning Show elements:
SpongeBob SquarePants
Shugo Chara!
Teen Titans Go!
Kingdom Hearts
Steven Universe
Phineas and Ferb
The Big Bang Theory
Soul Eater
Gravity Falls
Johnny Test
Bee & Puppycat

New show elements:
Regular Show
Adventure Time
Uncle Grandpa
The Haunted Hathaways
